item.title: Making the Exodus II
item.description: Satan’s grip on the world is tightening, but this video shows a group of boys rescuing their dog from a boa constrictor. These kids are way tougher than I am. Not all heroes wear capes.ğŸ˜‡ The things we do for our dogs, bruh...ğŸ’ªğŸ¶ğŸ˜ pic.twitter.com/25xei1sLVw — Rex ChapmanğŸ‡ğŸ¼ (@RexChapman) September 26, 2019 Though the video ends well, its lasting effect is less than pleasant. Our minds supply the dialog, the sub-plots, and the clichÃ©s.

item.title: Cold Showers and Confession
